text: aur unhen hat karo, jahaan pao aur unhen nikaalo, jahaan se unhonne tumhen nikaala hai, isalie ki fitana[1] (upadrav), hat karane se bhee bura hai aur unase masjide haî€¼raam ke paas yudhd na karo, jab tak ve tumase vahaan yudhd[2] na karen. parantu, yadi ve tumase yudhd karen, to unakee hatya karo, yahee kaafiron ka badala hai
